title: Ticket #2468: Remove TransferFile, ErrOrig, OutOrig attributes
description: Attributes OutOrig and ErrOrig were only used prior to 6.7.14. TransferFiles was replaced by ShouldTransferFiles and WhenToTransferOutput around Condor 6.5.x. It's still set, but the new attributes are always set, so code to consult the old attribute should never get hit.
remarks:
2011-Sep-16 14:28:53 by jfrey:
Some of the work to remove TransferFile was already done for #2273, but temporarily reverted until an underlying bug could be fixed.

2011-Sep-22 16:10:06 by jfrey:
This change doesn't require any mention in the version history, as the removed code wouldn't be executed.
check_ins:
2011-Sep-16 14:45   Check-in [27261]: Remove old attribute ATTR_TRANSFER_FILES. #2468 This attribute was replaced around Condor 6.5.x, and now we no longer set it. This is attempt number two. The first time, my changes conflicted with changes for #2273. (By Jaime Frey )
2011-Sep-16 14:21   Check-in [27259]: Remove dead attributes ATTR_JOB_OUTPUT/ERROR_ORIG. #2468 These attributes haven't be used since 6.7.14. This is attempt number two. The first time, I missed a call site. (By Jaime Frey )
2011-Sep-16 14:04   Check-in [27254]: Revert "Remove dead attributes ATTR_JOB_OUTPUT/ERROR_ORIG. #2468" This reverts commit e07dc67c7e7d298624866b5f1af947dc90889171. (By Jaime Frey )
2011-Sep-16 14:04   Check-in [27253]: Revert "Remove old attribute ATTR_TRANSFER_FILES. #2468" This reverts commit 04e85639ac36dc3057f8a9624950b11dd93e76e7. (By Jaime Frey )
2011-Sep-16 11:20   Check-in [27250]: Remove old attribute ATTR_TRANSFER_FILES. #2468 This attribute was replaced around Condor 6.5.x. It's still set in the job ad, but it's undocumented now and the newer attributes are always set as well, so code consulting the old attribute should never get hit. (By Jaime Frey )
2011-Sep-16 11:20   Check-in [27249]: Remove dead attributes ATTR_JOB_OUTPUT/ERROR_ORIG. #2468 These attributes haven't be used since 6.7.14. (By Jaime Frey )
